greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of chordal labeled graphs (connected or not) with n nodes.
reference: N. C. Wormald, Counting labeled chordal graphs. Graphs Combin. 1 (1985), no. 2, 193-200.
link: Jun Kawahara, Toshiki Saitoh, Hirofumi Suzuki, Ryo Yoshinaka, Enumerating All Subgraphs without Forbidden Induced Subgraphs via Multivalued Decision Diagrams, arXiv:1804.03822 [cs.DS], 2018.
formula: From the relation G(x)=exp(g(x)) between generating functions for connected g(x) and all G(x) labeled structures and considering generating functions for chordal graphs (c_n, A007134), we have a(n) = c(n) + 1/n * Sum_{k=1}^(n - 1) k * binomial(n, k) * c(k) * a(n - k). [Formula edited by _Michael De Vlieger_, Jul 04 2018]
results.author: Robert Castelo (rcastelo(AT)imim.es), Jan 06 2001
ext: a(13) from formula by _Falk Hüffner_, Jul 24 2019
